title: Lighten Up With Ken Davis - 35 Sermons
description:
----------------------------------------------------------------
LIGHTEN UP WITH KEN DAVIS - 35 SERMONS
----------------------------------------------------------------

Lighten Up with Ken Davis is a 2 minute daily feature designed to brighten your day and encourage your faith. With humor and insight, Ken Davis will challenge you to grow in your relationship to God, your family, and those around you.

Today's torrent contains 35 bible inspired sermons preached during the 2013 calendar year.  Each sermon is about 2 minutes long.  Details of all 35 topics include...

 * 2013 - A Golfing Tip On Improving Your Aim
 * 2013 - A Way To Make Shopping For Clothes More Exciting
 * 2013 - A Young WWII Soldier's Powerful Story
 * 2013 - Be Careful What You Promise Your Wife
 * 2013 - Everyone Has Trouble In Life
 * 2013 - Focus On The Good Not The Bad
 * 2013 - Geeky Sheep Can't Run Right
 * 2013 - I Would Save You Most Nights But Not Tonight
 * 2013 - Intimidating A Young Suitor Who Comes To The Door
 * 2013 - Is Being A Teenager A Mental Illness
 * 2013 - Ken and His Wife Diane Love Doing Things Together
 * 2013 - Ken Finds Evidence For The Effects Of Nature Over Time
 * 2013 - Ken Has Met The Perfect Christian
 * 2013 - Ken is Not a Fan of Bumper Stickers
 * 2013 - Ken Remembers When He Rode The Big One
 * 2013 - Ken Shares His Unique Perspective Of Bible Truth
 * 2013 - Ken Wants to Introduce You to His Grandchildren
 * 2013 - Ken's Wife Helps Him To Negotiate His First Big Payday
 * 2013 - Kids are Angels With Messages of God
 * 2013 - Losing Weight Is Good For The Spirit
 * 2013 - Nothing Worth Having Is Easy
 * 2013 - Parents And Teachers Say Crazy Things
 * 2013 - Pastors Are People Too
 * 2013 - Sheep Would Make A Terrible Mascot
 * 2013 - Some Common Phrases That Just Don't Make Sense
 * 2013 - Some Strange Things Happen When You Turn 50
 * 2013 - The Advantage Of Looking Young
 * 2013 - The Outdoors Testifies To The Glory Of God
 * 2013 - There Are Some Advantages To Having A Small Dog
 * 2013 - What if God Acted Like Doctors and Lawyers
 * 2013 - What Would It Be Like To Break All The Rules
 * 2013 - What Would It Feel Like To Be A Living Sacrifice
 * 2013 - Will You Be My Daddy
 * 2013 - Would You Rather Be A Sheep, Or A German Shepherd
 * 2013 - Young Kids Are Strange Creatures

And while you're at it, if you haven't already, be sure to check out some of my other Sermon Packages found here on The Pirate Bay.  To date there are 17 packages to choose from (accounting for 747 sermons in total) including...

 * A New Beginning With Greg Laurie - 40 Sermons
 * A Quick Word With Beth Moore - 59 Sermons
 * Back To The Bible With Woodrow Kroll - 60 Sermons
 * Daily Hope With Pastor Rick Warren - 45 Sermons
 * FamilyLife Today With Dennis Rainey - 60 Sermons
 * From His Heart With Jeff Schreve - 25 Sermons
 * Grace Church With Pastor Troy Dobbs - 60 Sermons
 * Grace To You With John MacArthur - 23 Sermons
 * Insight For Living With Chuch Swindoll - 22 Sermons
 * Lighten Up With Ken Davis - 35 Sermons
 * Living On The Edge With Chip Ingram - 16 Sermons
 * My Family Talk With Dr James Dobson - 22 Sermons
 * PowerPoint With Jack Graham - 30 Sermons
 * Precepts For Life With Kay Arthur - 75 Sermons
 * Unlocking The Bible With Colin Smith - 30 Sermons
 * UpWords With Max Lucado - 83 Sermons
 * Walk In The Word With Dr James MacDonald - 62 Sermons

For His Glory,
TorrentTracts - September 2013
